so far there I've got the first proof crawling (single instance but 
HashMa=
p'ed) going for 4 days with 12M docs downloaded. I just got the 
first OOME=
 error. I wonder if it's because that I turned the option

 <boolean name=
=3D"hold-queues">false</boolean>

to false. We were using "true" for the la=
st crawl but we thought it 
might be a better practice to rotate the queues=
 more frequently (to 
prevent the busy crawling on certain sites).

Do you =
want to look the OOME problem further? What information should 
I send?

Ch=
eers,
-Joe
